Hello, Arpon here. I’m a graduate student in mathematics, but I’m often distracted by stuff that’s not mathematics.

My mathematical thoughts are usually somewhere around homotopy theory. My academic webpage contains some of my longer mathematical writing.

Things that have been distracting me recently include: fiction, creative writing, and music.
